attributes.action: admit that it is the policy of Her Majesty's Government to withhold the swine flu vaccine from people who are infirm or who cannot visit their GPs surgery.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My GP practice has refused to provide a home visit to give a swine flu vacccination for my 86 year old mother who is unable to visit the surgery for it . The reason given was that the local PCT will not pay for it.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
